英文公告.附加說明: Contract Performance and working items:(1)The procuring types of dispenser include the submersible electronic dispenser and suction electronic dispenser (including installation). The amount of each type:①Suction dispenser:Single diesel product dispenser with 2-nozzle – 2 sets Three kinds of gasoline/diesel products dispenser with 6-nozzle – 2 sets Three kinds of gasoline products dispenser with 6-nozzle – 8 sets②Submersible electronic dispenser:Single diesel product dispenser with 2-nozzle – 10 setsTwo kinds of gasoline products dispenser with 4-nozzle – 3 setsThree kinds of gasoline/diesel products dispenser with 6-nozzle – 4 setsThree kinds of gasoline products dispenser with 6-nozzle – 14 sets③The vapor recovery system – 31 sets(2)Working Items: The winning bidder shall provide six-year warranty and guarantee of maintenance and repairs (including repair, labor, material, test, and consumable accessories renewing) after acceptance.(3)Payment: According to the awarded contract, Article 5 in Gasoline Dispenser Procurement of 2013.
